name: Keplers Cosmic Arcade
description:
I made a 2d planetary orbit sandbox for my kids. Get a feel for orbital motion - and have fun blowing stuff up.

Featuring
  • Orbital motion mechanics
  • Arcade physics
  • Explosions
  • No goals or restrictions - just chaotic fun
Build a solar system

Combine - Spawn 4 different types of planetary bodies in 7 different sizes: Mineral, Water, Carbon-rich or Gaseous.

Easy to use - Planets are automatically inserted into orbit around the sun.

Dynamic - As planets collide they either fracture into smaller parts,  are absorbed forming a new type of planet, or grow in size.

Scenarios - Start with an empty solar system, or build from an existing scenario such as The Asteroid Field or The Stellar Nursery
